properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, dated April 3, [1936], on stationery from the Manila Hotel; includes family matters and travel plans; mentions Marion Blossom and Miss Forbes.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
